metadata.name: Flowers and Vase
metadata.description:
"Flowers and Vase" - 2016 
76x75x6 cm
Synthetic wax, marble dust, oil paint and polyethylene foam on wood

**cR** describes his physical work as â€œAt 260 degrees Celsius it is a diaphanous painting, after cooling down it is a diaphanous sculpture. And the powerful act of this morphogenesis is recorded in cracks, ridges and craters. This transformation from hot liquid to cold, solid matter emanates a special presence."
